unnormalised: Doctors handwriting is so bad, I thought my blood test results saying 99% awesome was a typo. Turns out I'm just a 1% away from needing a new liver, LOL!
normalised: Doctors handwriting is so bad, I thought my blood test results saying ninety nine percent awesome was a typo. Turns out I'm just a one percent away from needing a new liver, L-O-L!
